command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/c/0/8/dataset_c0824522-8e1c-458f-89af-534bd684e8b2.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&        bcftools call  -m --prior 0.0011               --group-samples -       --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/e/c/1/dataset_ec1837cf-b915-4e32-876c-11435bdbc40d.dat'

params.sec_input_output: {"format_fields": "", "group_samples": true, "keep_alts": false, "keep_masked_ref": false, "output_tags": null, "skip_variants": null, "variants_only": false}
